oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crisis management and Organic Foods Industry: How to keep consumer confidence in times of negative media coverage
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Arp, Kirsten
Wegner, Karin
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Consumer issues
Education, extension and communication
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Consumer confidence is a very important basis for further development of the Organic Food Sector worldwide. But consumer confidence can be destroyed through (Organic) food crisis or scandals. That is why it is very important to be prepared as an individual company and as the sector as a whole. Crisis management like a crisis plan and issue management can minimize the reputational and financial damage.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Arp, Kirsten and Wegner, Karin (2014) Crisis management and Organic Foods Industry: How to keep consumer confidence in times of negative media coverage. Paper at: IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
